languages.text: "Без сомнения. Господин ван Калокс заслужил мое полное доверие, неоднократно проявив отвагу, преданность и смекалку. Его математический, не склонный к сантиментам ум очень полезен в экстренных ситуациях. Из тебя, дорогой Хейнрикс, получился куда лучший агент, чем вышел бы пилот Имперского Рыцаря".

traits.locale_text: "Без сомнения. Господин ван Калигос заслужил мое полное доверие, неоднократно проявив отвагу, преданность и смекалку. Его математический, не склонный к сантиментам ум очень полезен в экстренных ситуациях. Из тебя, дорогой Хейнрикс, получился куда лучший агент, чем вышел бы пилот Имперского Рыцаря".

languages.text: "Without a doubt. Master van Calox has earned my complete trust by repeatedly demonstrating courage, loyalty, and cunning. His mathematical mind, not given to sentiment, can be of great use in an emergency. You, my dear Heinrix, have made a far better agent than you would have a pilot of an Imperial Knight."
languages.original_text: "Без сомнения. Господин ван Калокс заслужил мое полное доверие, неоднократно проявив отвагу, преданность и смекалку. Его математический, не склонный к сантиментам ум очень полезен в экстренных ситуациях. Из тебя, дорогой Хейнрикс, получился куда лучший агент, чем вышел бы пилот Имперского Рыцаря".

His mathematical mind, not given to sentiment, can be of great use in an emergency. You, my dear Heinrix, have made a far better agent than you would have a pilot of an Imperial Knight."

His mathematical mind, not given to sentiment, can be of great use in an emergency. You, my dear Heinrix, have made a far better agent than you would have a pilot of an Imperial Knight."

His mathematical mind, not given to sentiment, can be of great use in an emergency. You, my dear Heinrix, have made a far better agent than you would have a pilot of an Imperial Knight."

"Without a doubt. Master van Calox has earned my complete trust by repeatedly demonstrating courage, loyalty, and cunning. His mathematical mind, not given to sentiment, can be of great use in an emergency. You, my dear Heinrix, have made a far better agent than you would have a pilot of an Imperial Knight."

"Without a doubt. Master van Calox has earned my complete trust by repeatedly demonstrating courage, loyalty, and cunning. His mathematical mind, not given to sentiment, can be of great use in an emergency. You, my dear Heinrix, have made a far better agent than you would have a pilot of an Imperial Knight."

languages.text: 「間違いなく優秀だ。マスター・ヴァン・カロックスは、勇気と忠誠と巧みな手腕を度々示し、私は完全に信頼を置いている。感情が入り込まないその数学的頭脳は、緊急の際には大いに役立つ。親愛なるハインリックスよ、お前は、異端審問庁で圧倒的に優れた職員となった。インペリアルナイトのパイロットとなる道を選んでいたら、こうはならなかっただろう」
languages.original_text: "Without a doubt. Master van Calox has earned my complete trust by repeatedly demonstrating courage, loyalty, and cunning. His mathematical mind, not given to sentiment, can be of great use in an emergency. You, my dear Heinrix, have made a far better agent than you would have a pilot of an Imperial Knight."

traits.locale_text: 「間違いなく優秀だ。マスター・ヴァン・カロックスは、勇気と忠誠と巧みな手腕を度々示し、私は完全に信頼を置いている。感情が入り込まないその数学的頭脳は、緊急の際には大いに役立つ。親愛なるハインリックスよ、お前は、異端審問庁で圧倒的に優れた職員となった。インペリアルナイトのパイロットとなる道を選んでいたら、こうはならなかっただろう」

languages.original_text: "Without a doubt. Master van Calox has earned my complete trust by repeatedly demonstrating courage, loyalty, and cunning. His mathematical mind, not given to sentiment, can be of great use in an emergency. You, my dear Heinrix, have made a far better agent than you would have a pilot of an Imperial Knight."

languages.text: “显而易见，是的。冯·卡洛克斯大师一直以来都展现出了出色的勇气、忠诚和机敏，这赢得了我全心全意的信赖。他有头脑理智，临危不乱，从不感情用事。是啊，我亲爱的海因里希，比起帝国骑士的驾驶员，你显然更适合当黄金王座的代理人。”
languages.original_text: "Without a doubt. Master van Calox has earned my complete trust by repeatedly demonstrating courage, loyalty, and cunning. His mathematical mind, not given to sentiment, can be of great use in an emergency. You, my dear Heinrix, have made a far better agent than you would have a pilot of an Imperial Knight."

traits.locale_text: “显而易见，是的。冯·卡洛克斯大师一直以来都展现出了出色的勇气、忠诚和机敏，这赢得了我全心全意的信赖。他有头脑理智，临危不乱，从不感情用事。是啊，我亲爱的海因里希，比起帝国骑士的飞行员，你显然更适合当黄金王座的代理人。”

languages.text: «Sin duda. El maestro van Calox se ha ganado mi plena confianza al demostrar repetidamente su valor, su lealtad y su astucia. Su mente matemática es poco dada a los sentimientos y resulta particularmente eficaz en las emergencias. Mi estimado Heinrix, ha resultado mucho más eficaz como agente de lo que hubiera sido como piloto de Caballeros Imperiales».
languages.original_text: "Without a doubt. Master van Calox has earned my complete trust by repeatedly demonstrating courage, loyalty, and cunning. His mathematical mind, not given to sentiment, can be of great use in an emergency. You, my dear Heinrix, have made a far better agent than you would have a pilot of an Imperial Knight."

traits.locale_text: «Sin duda. El maestro van Calox se ha ganado mi plena confianza al demostrar repetidamente su valor, su lealtad y su astucia. Su mente matemática es poco dada a los sentimientos y resulta particularmente eficaz en las emergencias. Mi estimado Heinrix, ha resultado mucho más eficaz como agente de lo que hubiera sido como piloto de Caballeros Imperiales».

languages.text: « Cela ne fait aucun doute. J'ai toute confiance en maître van Calox, qui a su démontrer à plus d'une occasion toute l'étendue de son courage, de sa loyauté et de son ingéniosité. Dans les situations d'urgence, son esprit mathématique dépourvu du moindre sentiment peut se révéler indispensable. Mon cher Heinrix, vous faites un bien meilleur agent que vous n'auriez fait un pilote de Chevalier Impérial. »
languages.original_text: "Without a doubt. Master van Calox has earned my complete trust by repeatedly demonstrating courage, loyalty, and cunning. His mathematical mind, not given to sentiment, can be of great use in an emergency. You, my dear Heinrix, have made a far better agent than you would have a pilot of an Imperial Knight."

traits.locale_text: « Cela ne fait aucun doute. J'ai toute confiance en maître van Calox, qui a su démontrer à plus d'une occasion toute l'étendue de son courage, de sa loyauté et de son ingéniosité. Dans les situations d'urgence, son esprit mathématique dépourvu du moindre sentiment peut se révéler indispensable. Mon cher Heinrix, vous faites un bien meilleur agent que vous n'auriez fait un pilote de Chevalier Impérial. »

languages.text: "Ganz ohne Zweifel. Meister van Calox hat mein volles Vertrauen, nachdem er wiederholt Mut, Loyalität und Können bewiesen hat. Sein mathematischer Verstand, der ohne Gefühle operiert, kann in Notfällen von großem Nutzen sein. Ihr, werter Heinrix, seid als Agent weitaus besser, als Ihr es als Pilot eines Imperialen Ritters gewesen wärt."
languages.original_text: "Without a doubt. Master van Calox has earned my complete trust by repeatedly demonstrating courage, loyalty, and cunning. His mathematical mind, not given to sentiment, can be of great use in an emergency. You, my dear Heinrix, have made a far better agent than you would have a pilot of an Imperial Knight."

traits.locale_text: "Ganz ohne Zweifel. Meister van Calox hat mein volles Vertrauen, nachdem er wiederholt Mut, Loyalität und Können bewiesen hat. Sein mathematischer Verstand, der ohne Gefühle operiert, kann in Notfällen von großem Nutzen sein. Ihr, werter Heinrix, seid als Agent weitaus besser, als Ihr es als Pilot eines Imperialen Ritters gewesen wärt."

languages.text: "Ona hiç şüphe yok. Üstat van Calox; tekrar tekrar sergilediği cesareti, sadakati ve zekâsıyla benim güvenimi sonuna kadar kazanmıştır. Duygusallığa boyun eğmeyen matematiksel zihni, acil durumlarda muazzam işe yarayabiliyor. Sevgili Heinrix, sen bir ajan, bir İmparatorluk Şövalyesi pilotu olarak yapabileceğinden çok daha fazlasını yaptın."
languages.original_text: "Without a doubt. Master van Calox has earned my complete trust by repeatedly demonstrating courage, loyalty, and cunning. His mathematical mind, not given to sentiment, can be of great use in an emergency. You, my dear Heinrix, have made a far better agent than you would have a pilot of an Imperial Knight."

traits.locale_text: "Ona hiç şüphe yok. Üstat van Calox tekrar tekrar sergilediği cesareti, sadakati ve zekâsıyla benim güvenimi sonuna kadar kazanmıştır. Duygusallığa boyun eğmeyen matematiksel zihni acil durumlarda muazzam işe yarayabiliyor. Sevgili Heinrix, sen bir ajan olarak, bir İmparatorluk Şövalyesi pilotu olarak yapabileceğinden çok daha fazlasını yaptın."
